tool_description: Auto all-in-one tool for email deliverability to make your Email Channel Reliable
name: Warmy - Email Channel Reliable
title: Warmy - Email Channel Reliable

api_list.name: Mailbox reputation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://warmy-email-channel-reliable.p.rapidapi.com/email_warmup/v1/user_credentials/reputation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "warmy-email-channel-reliable.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
